minimalist_corporate.name: Minimalist Corporate

visual_style.composition: centered, balanced, lots of white space
visual_style.detail_level: minimal detail, focus on essential elements
visual_style.geometry: clean lines, geometric shapes, rectangular forms

dos: Use clean typography and minimal text
Use subtle gradients and soft shadows
minimalist_corporate.style_keywords: minimalist, clean, corporate, professional, modern, geometric, balanced, sophisticated

vibrant_creative.name: Vibrant Creative
vibrant_creative.description: Bold, energetic, artistic brand for creative industries

visual_style.texture: mixed textures, artistic brushstrokes, organic patterns
visual_style.detail_level: rich detail, layered elements, visual interest
visual_style.geometry: organic shapes, flowing lines, creative layouts

dos: Include creative typography and hand-lettered elements
vibrant_creative.style_keywords: vibrant, creative, artistic, bold, energetic, dynamic, colorful, expressive, modern art

luxury_premium.name: Luxury Premium

visual_style.texture: rich materials, leather, marble, gold, velvet
visual_style.geometry: classical proportions, ornate details, refined forms
visual_style.color_treatment: rich deep colors, metallic accents, subtle gradients

dos: Focus on craftsmanship and quality details
donts: No trendy or temporary design elements
luxury_premium.style_keywords: luxury, premium, elegant, sophisticated, exclusive, classic, refined, high-end, prestigious

template_structure.base_subject: The main subject or object to be depicted
template_structure.style_application: How the selected style profile is applied
template_structure.aspect_ratio: Dimensional constraints from the style profile
